1371640.name: Amira
1371640.description:
Amira tells the story of a young girl and her battle for freedom against the occupiers who try to take her beautiful sad land that is already filled with many mythical beasts that protect the final words of the dead.

The place where middle eastern mythical world meets modern technology, how will amira fight reach her freedom, how will she fare up when all she has is magic and special abilities against the endless technological war machine.

what will happen to her hopes and dreams? How will she achieve her ever fleeting freedom whom both her family and the occupiers try to take? What will happen to the legacy of the dead?

Key Features:

  • Occupiers Lurk At Every Corner: You utilize every weapon and ability you can get to secure your freedom and repel them.

  • Explore The Traces Your Dead Mother: in world filled with middle eastern mythical creatures inhabiting it, and occupiers that try to take it away.

  • Uncover the secret: and trauma that led your family to try and control your mind and spirit.

  • Collect The final words of the dead: carrying the hidden stories in this beautiful sad land, and let them empower you

  • Find The One You Love: with an unexpected encounter making a cute innocent romance as you both fight the occupiers in your own way.
1371640.supported_languages:
英语*, 阿拉伯语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
